snippet: One of India's few international models, on making it in an industry dominated by "blond-haired, blue-eyed women."
abstract: One of India's few international models, on making it in an industry dominated by "blond-haired, blue-eyed women."
lead_paragraph: While literature and Bollywood film stars like Freida Pinto are part of a recent boom in the export of Indian culture, fashion models making international headway are in surprisingly short supply. Lakshmi Menon is an exception.
